[00:00.06]breathin (Explicit) - Ariana Grande
[00:00.65]Lyricist：Ilya Salmanzadeh/Peter Svensson/Savan Kotecha/Ariana Grande
[00:00.95]Composer：Ilya Salmanzadeh/Peter Svensson/Savan Kotecha/Ariana Grande

[00:07.26]Mixing Engineer：John Hanes
[00:09.91]Some days things just take way too much of my energy
[00:17.03]I look up and the whole room's spinning
[00:20.11]You take my cares away
[00:24.32]I can so overcomplicate people tell me to medicate
[00:29.22]Feel my blood runnin' swear the sky's fallin'
[00:34.39]How do I know if this sh*t's fabricated
[00:39.03]Time goes by and I can't control my mind
[00:43.95]Don't know what else to try but you tell me every time
[00:49.52]Just keep breathin' and breathin' and breathin' and breathin'
[00:55.12]I know I gotta keep keep on breathin'
[00:59.10]Just keep breathin' and breathin' and breathin' and breathin'
[01:04.79]I know I gotta keep keep on breathin'
[01:09.82]Sometimes it's hard to find find my way up into the clouds
[01:17.09]Tune it out they can be so loud
[01:20.07]You remind me of a time when things weren't so complicated
[01:26.73]All I need is to see your face
[01:29.43]Feel my blood runnin' swear the sky's fallin'
[01:34.31]How do I know if this sh*t's fabricated oh

[01:59.12]Just keep breathin' and breathin' and breathin' and breathin'

[00:09.91]有时候感觉自己被抽离般的无力感涌上心间
[00:17.03]抬头仰望天空 仿佛世界天旋地转
[00:20.11]你带走了我所有的关心忧虑
[00:24.32]或许是我想得太多 朋友都劝我服用药物
[00:29.22]感觉血液在身体里翻涌 天空仿佛就要坍塌陷落
[00:34.39]我知道这些听起来像是无稽之谈
[00:39.03]随着时间的流逝 我渐渐失去理智
[00:43.95]我不知道还有什么努力的必要 但每一次你都会对我说
[00:49.52]无论怎样 请深呼吸 深呼吸
[00:55.12]我知道我得深呼吸 用力呼吸

[01:09.82]有时候感觉自己双眼被蒙蔽般寻不到出路
[01:17.09]想脱离喧嚣 得到内心的平静
[01:20.07]你让我回想起曾经单纯而美好的往昔岁月
[01:26.73]我只想再看一眼你的脸庞
